Develop and manage test plans and test strategies.
Mentor QA team members in testing best practices.
Support DevOps team with setting up automated testing in the CI/CD pipeline.
Plan, create, and manage the overall QA strategy.

Develop and maintain automated test suites for mobile apps.
Ensure high coverage and accuracy through continuous testing.

Design and execute automated tests using Cypress.
Track QA metrics such as defect densities and open defect counts.
Contribute to continuous improvement of development processes.
Create and execute detailed and well-structured test cases based on requirements.
Track and report quality metrics such as defects and test execution counts.
Conduct regression tests to validate functionality after code changes.
Participate in Agile ceremonies and contribute testing updates and feedback.
